basics.name: Vu Nguyen
basics.label: Fullstack developer
basics.summary: I am a Fullstack developer who loves to see the big picture but I can also work in great details. I am passionate about technologies, entrepreneurship and personal development. Over the years, I have participated in many hackathons such as Junction, AngelHack, UltraHack, Iot Hackathon, Robot against Humanity Hackathon. In Junction 2017 I was in a team of 4 who won the first prize in one of the companies challenges and got a ticket to attend Slush 2017. In 2018 I was in a team of 3 and we won the first prize in UltraHack Sprint II with the prize of 7000e and 2 Slush tickets. Further development of the project will be supported by VTT and UN. I am constantly and actively improving my skills in software development through learning online courses, attending hackathons, participating tech meetups like HelsinkiJS/ReactJS and I am helping other people to get into software development in coding clubs.

work.summary: Fullstack web development for Catapult Platform. I am working mainly in Django, Postgres, Angular and Elasticsearch.
highlights: Designed, developed and maintained web applications features
Created RESTful APIs so external services can interact with the platform
Designed, implemented databases and developed backend services, wrote unit tests
Conducted code reviews, fixed bugs, improved UI/UX
Designed and implemented full-text search with operators like AND, OR, NOT, parentheses using Django and Postgres
Improved search performance by 10x by using Elasticsearch

work.summary: Fullstack web development on inhouse and customer projects using ReactJS, NodeJS, MySQL, MongoDB, deploying to Azure cloud, mobile app development with React-Native

highlights: Developing a feature for web application both frontend and backend, users can send enquiry data to the backend using Drupal PHP/MySQL, admin can manage all enquiries through admin dashboard.
Working directly with the CTO to build a web application from scratch using VueJS framework, Bootstrap UI. The application is for fleet managers, cars owners to manage vehicles and payment.
Researching and consulting the CTO on different technologies that can be used for building web application, mobile application.
Designing and developing new UI for the mobile app. The new UI looks completely different from the previous version and received praises from CEO and managers.

Building new website for the company using WordPress. The previous website was built using web builder which has some limitations. The new website has reduced the website monthly cost for the company and helped gaining more controls on the website.
One-man business, handling all paper works, accounting, marketing, sales, customer service, cleaning, etc.

For a Telecom Company client: automation testing for router's software. Working in Lab, building up, configuring, troubleshooting routers, switches, networks, traffic generators and other testing devices. Writing test script using TCL scripting language. Installing, testing software, finding and reporting bugs
For another client: automation tests for web application testing. Using Python, Robotframework, Selenium for automation tests.
Manual testing clinical system, patient monitors
Installing, testing software, finding and reporting bugs

volunteer.summary: Leading the association as a president
highlights: Leading the Board of Directors(6 members) to solve problems of the association such as organizational structure, responsibilities of each member, funding, conflict between members
Decision making, being the contact person to other organizations/partners.
Organising events such as cultural events, sport events, educational events

volunteer.summary: Practising Public Speaking and Leadership Skills. Attending meetings every other week
highlights: Delivering speeches
Evaluating/Giving feedbacks to other members speeches
Organising summer party
